summary: 9 years of experience full stack software developer with design abilities equipped to deeply understand users and business while overcoming technical hurdles. I seek honorable and adventurous collaborators uncovering their full potential and helping others flourish.

bullets: Designed and developed an audience engagement app for content creators, acquiring 2,500 users in its first month using Next.js, Typescript, Tailwind CSS, Prisma, PostgreSQL, and Vercel
Established a continuous feedback loop by monitoring users with Google Analytics, and Microsoft Clarity, and running usability tests with early adopters
Introduced Scrum and documented procedures utilizing ClickUp to clarify the technical workflow for non-technical stakeholders
Onboarded an engineer and documented the code to a successful responsibility transfer

Conceived a digital museum guide by leading a team of 3 augmenting 55k museum visits using Next.js, TypeScript, Apollo, GraphQL, Chakra-UI, PostgreSQL, and Heroku, tripling visitors' adoption compared to the previous native museum app
Single-handedly built a prototype using Preact, pitched and secured Canada's largest art museum as an early collaborator two weeks after the idea's inception
Brought image recognition and 3D to the browser, conducted user experience tests to improve on friction points, doubling education content engagement among museum visitors
Recruited three software engineers and managed collaboration with outsourcing firms using agile and scrum to increase development speed and meet clients’ demands
Engineered a continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipeline across multiple instances utilizing Git, Heroku, and Bash streamlining individual contributions
Authored and submitted successful grant proposals, securing $160K in funding and $25K in sponsorships from government and incubators, enabling key developmental milestones
Produced promotional and sales visual assets, leading teams of up to 8, to ensure visibility and demonstrability of product on the web and at industry events

Re-designed branding, user experience, and user interface of a data-intensive workforce management tool using Django, React.js and MUI, positioning the product as the modern option and reducing most paths to action by 30%
Proposed new frontend patterns and tooling, coached offshore developers on using data visualization and calendar tools to improve development speed and code quality
